title: Assets
description: Manage your token assets across multiple ledgers.

messages.createFirstAsset: Create your first asset to get started

draft.title: Draft
draft.details: Asset is being configured with metadata, compliance settings, and ledger configuration. No issuances can be made in this stage.

active.title: Active
active.details: Asset is live and ready for issuances. Holders can be authorized and tokens can be issued to authorized addresses.

paused.title: Paused
paused.details: Asset is temporarily suspended. No new issuances can be made, but existing balances remain intact. Can be reactivated to Active status.

retired.title: Retired
retired.details: Asset is permanently closed. No new issuances or authorizations can be made. This action is irreversible.

noCompliance.title: No Compliance (OFF)
noCompliance.description: No compliance checks or records are maintained.

recordOnly.title: Record Only (RECORD_ONLY)
recordOnly.description: Compliance records are created but no enforcement.

items.0: Always test assets in Draft mode before activating
items.1: Use appropriate compliance modes for your regulatory requirements
items.2: Monitor asset usage and consider pausing if suspicious activity is detected
items.3: Only retire assets when absolutely necessary, as this action is irreversible
items.4: Keep asset metadata up to date for audit and compliance purposes

createAsset.title: Create Asset
createAsset.description: Create a new token asset for issuance across multiple ledgers.

registry.title: Registry Information
registry.description: Registry information helps with compliance and regulatory reporting. This data will be stored off-chain and can be referenced in compliance records.

controls.title: Ledger-Specific Controls
controls.description: These controls affect how the asset behaves on the selected ledger. Some options may not be available for all ledgers.
